Texto: 
altered mental status.
ascites
splenomegaly
elevated bilirubin
awaiting liver transplant
• high signal intensity changes in the globus pallidus - bilateral, cerebral peduncles, and centrum semiovale ont1, t2 and flair
• splenomegaly
• cirrhosis of liver and vascular changes of portal hypertension
hepatic encephalopathy w/globus pallidus hyperintensity
carbon monoxide exposure
prior manganese exposure
liver failure
tpn (total parenteral nutrition)
56 year old woman with a 6 year history of chronic hepatitis.  recent decompensation and now on transplant list.
